subject: p10410641
Findings: Bilateral pleural catheters remain in place. Small residual apicolateral pneumothoraces are present, both decreased from the prior chest x-ray. Heart size remains normal. Bilateral pleural effusions and left basilar atelectasis are again demonstrated with slight improvement in aeration at the left lung base.
